title: Connecting to games
body:
Please help, 

After champ select over half the time with the new client I can not connect to games and 3 times now I wasint able to connect before remake most of the time if I spam the reconnect button it will eventually connect this is getting really old I have lost so much LP and MMR to this

replies.body: After champion select, your connection needs to change over to the game server but it looks like something is blocking you from doing that.  Go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this towards a fix.  Test it out in custom games to prevent penalties as well.  This should get you back in and getting LP again!

Hi Porocles, 

I've literally never had this issue with the legacy client, but not after about 50% of my champion selections, the game will pop up a black screen and fail to load, prompting me to close the game and reconnect from the client to fix the issue. It's extremely consistent since the introduction of the new client, and a _lot_ of people are experiencing this issue. Has this been looked into?
I ran the repair and this seemed to help a lot btw

Black screens are usually caused by connection problems that can't reach the game server, so it fails to download any assets.  This is the same regardless of client versions, so our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help out with this.  Let me know how that works out for you.
clearly something has changed when the client was changed this NEVER happened before
